Element.name: btnCrteNwZoneMap
Element.xpath: //button[contains(text(),'Create New Zone Map') and not(contains(text(),'Copy and'))]

Element.name: lnkRgnInPolrCrdnts
Element.xpath: //div[contains(text(),'Select a region name from left side list.')]/p/button

Element.name: cmbxRadiusFrom
Element.xpath: //div[@class='modal hide in']//h4/..//select[@data-bind='value: from_radius, options: U.options_for_percent, optionsText: 'text', optionsValue: 'value'']

Element.name: cmbxRadiusTo
Element.xpath: //div[@class='modal hide in']//h4/..//select[@data-bind='value: to_radius, options: U.options_for_percent, optionsText: 'text', optionsValue: 'value'']

Element.name: txtRecrtZoneHelpTxt
Element.xpath: //li[contains(text(),'there are some defined default zone definitions')]

Element.name: txtManagerList
Element.xpath: //p[contains(text(),'This manager list all UCS_DEFAULT_ZONE_DEFINITIONs with VALID_UNTIL is NULL.')]

Element.name: txtMultipleSections
Element.xpath: //li/strong[contains(text(),'You can define multiple sections for single zone name')]

Element.name: txtReCreateForOldMaskset
Element.xpath: //li[contains(text(),'If user wants to bring new def to old maskset, use button')]

Element.name: txtInEditMode
Element.xpath: //h4[contains(text(),'In Edit mode, update the clearance values then click Save button.')]
